member.name: T:BakeryApplication.BakeryConsoleApp
member.summary: Console application operating bakes according taks.

member.name: M:BakeryApplication.BakeryConsoleApp.FindPriceCalorieEqualBakes(Bakery.Entities.Bake[],Bakery.Entities.Bake)
member.summary: Method searching bakes equal by calorie and price to given bake.
member.param: Array of bakes to search in.
member.returns: Array of bakes equal to given bake.

member.summary: Method to bakes with given component overrun.

member.returns: Array of bakes with component overrun.

member.name: M:BakeryApplication.BakeryConsoleApp.FindComponentCountOverrunBakes(Bakery.Entities.Bake[],System.Int32)
